text: Hello, how ware you today?
Hello, I'm alright.
Do you consider yourself someone that wants to make a change in the world?
Yes somewhat. With e environment and food system. What do you think of children's charities?
I think some are good but i've been donating to Save the Children (foundation). Have you ever heard of them?
I think I have. I've heard of Red Cross
It is similar in which all funds donated are used to help kids in need.
That's nice. How much would you donate if given the chance to help a childrens charity?
i'm not sure i already donate my time.
Oh ok. Do you have any other questions?
yes, have you heard about the crisis in syria?
Is it about the civil war in Syria?
Children are being hit with bombs they are looking for help in war zones
Thats horrible.. Is this recent? Is America helping?
not as much as they should. Given the chance would you be willing to donate some of your task payment to organizations like save the children?
Sure. I would.
choosing anywhere between $0 and all of your payment, how much would you like to donate?
Ill donate $1
Ok, your donation to Save the Children is greatly appreciated! One day at a time, people like you will help make the world a better place.
Yes they will
Have a wonderful day
